transcript.title: REPUBLIC REFERENDUM
transcript.content:
I will, in the near future, outline my reasons for supporting the present
constitutional system.

I will not, as speculated in one newspaper today, indicate that I think
a republic is inevitable. Others may hold that view. I do not.

Benjamin Franklin was right when he said : "in this world nothing can
be said to be certain, except death and taxes".

25 October 1999
